result.html: Ghearr mé mo chuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.

result.eng: I've no interest in television at all.

result.eng: I've been working in this shop for three years.

result.eng: I've been working in the same place for five years.

result.eng: I've been very busy since I was named mayor.

result.eng: I've had a limp since then.

result.eng: I've been here for a week.

result.eng: I've been in the city for ten years.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.

result.eng: My Lord knows what I've done.
